sentence.Network_en: So David went up, and his two wives, Ahinoam the, and Abigail Nabal's wife the Carmelite.
sentence.Network_cn: 2于是大卫和他的两个妻─一个是耶斯列人亚希暖, 一个是作过迦密人拿八妻的亚比该─都上那里去了.

sentence.Network_en: And David's two wives were and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.
sentence.Network_cn: 5大卫的两个妻―耶斯列人亚希暖和作过拿八妻的迦密人亚比该,也被掳去了.

sentence.Network_en: And David's two wives were, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.
sentence.Network_cn: 5大卫的两个妻─耶斯列人亚希暖和作过拿八妻的迦密人亚比该, 也被掳去了.
